DOC.brief_summary: The safety and efficacy of the Adhesix Bioring adjustable gastric band will be assessed in patients after failed RYGB.
DOC.brief_title: Gastric Banding After Failed Gastric Bypass
DOC.criteria: Patient must sign the informed consent form prior to the indexprocedure. Patient with failed RYGB defined as patients with EWL <50%. Patient has a life expectancy of less than 2 year. Patient who is most likely expected not to be compliant with the proposed followup visits.
